original_text: They destroyed the Moabites' towns. Each Israelite soldier threw a stone onto all the good fields, until they covered them with stones. They filled the springs so that they gave no water. They cut down all the good trees.
korean_text: 그 성읍들을 쳐서 헐고 각기 돌을 던져 모든 좋은 밭에 가득하게 하고 모든 샘을 메우고 모든 좋은 나무를 베고 길하레셋의 돌들은 남기고 물매꾼이 두루 다니며 치니라

sentences.original_text: Each Israelite soldier threw a stone
until they covered them with stones.
so that they gave no water.
They cut down all the good trees.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 모든 좋은 나무들을 베어 넘겼습니다.
